title: Three arrested in Meegoda with firearms and live ammunition
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police have arrested three suspects in the Meegoda area, in connection with a murder committed in the Rangala Police jurisdiction.
According to Police, firearms and live ammunition were seized from the possession of the suspects.
A firearm manufactured overseas, a locally manufactured Revolver, 12 rounds of 09mm ammunition, and 11 rounds of 5.26mm ammunition were found among the seized weapons.
The suspects, aged 22 to 24-years have been identified as residents of Owitagama and Yatapatha.
They were placed in remand custody after being produced before the Homagama Magistrate’s Court.
Kandy to GotaGoGama – Military veteran on a journey in a wheelchair
